snippet: In Game 3 of the A.L.C.S., the struggling Yankees will face Justin Verlander, the Tigers’ pitcher with a knack for piling up strikeouts. But the Yankees have proven before they can score off him.
abstract: New York Yankees prepare to face formidable Detroit Tigers pitcher Justin Verlander in Game 3 of the American League Championship Series; Verlander has a reputation for upping his performance in tough games, but records show the Yankees can score off him.
lead_paragraph: In Game 3 of the A.L.C.S., the struggling Yankees will face Justin Verlander, the Tigers’ pitcher with a knack for piling up strikeouts. But the Yankees have proven before they can score off him.

headline.seo: Tigers’ Justin Verlander Is Imposing but Not Perfect
headline.main: Verlander Is Imposing but Not Perfect
headline.print_headline: Verlander Has Been Vulnerable vs. Yanks
